text: te anaknea haey ban brachheang vinh noh chaur komaoy kar brachheang robsa ke thveu aoy anak( mou ham meat) pruoybaromph aoy saoh . kanleng vil tralb robsa puokke ku mokkan yeung temuoyokt . haey yeung nung brab puokke nouv avei del puokke ban br pru td . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha doeng nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa puokke)
